contestDescription: Capture the most stunning sunset photos and stand a chance to win amazing prizes.
taskSubmission: Submit up to 3 high-resolution photos capturing sunsets.

contestDescription: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for a hypothetical company.
taskSubmission: Submit a detailed digital marketing plan including social media, SEO, and PPC strategies.

contestDescription: Write an original short story on the theme 'New Beginnings'.
taskSubmission: Submit a short story of 2000-5000 words.

contestDescription: Write a detailed review of your favorite game released in the past year.
taskSubmission: Submit a review of 1000-2000 words, including gameplay experience, graphics, and overall rating.

contestDescription: Pitch your innovative business idea and win seed funding to kickstart your startup.
taskSubmission: Submit a business plan document outlining your idea, target market, and financial projections.

contestDescription: Write a compelling review of a recently published book of your choice.
taskSubmission: Submit a review of 500-1000 words, focusing on the book's plot, characters, and your personal insights.

contestDescription: Review the latest blockbuster and get a chance to win exciting prizes.
taskSubmission: Submit a review of 800-1500 words, covering the plot, performances, and your overall impression.
